conversations.conversation: I am going crazy stuck in the house all alone cz my missus has strted wrkin agen its not fair.....im gonna cry n curl up in a ball and sleep and sleep and sleep (u beta b feeling 4 me ppl!)yeh n so on.....sum1 giv me ideas 2 fill the day...other than cleanin ive gt brooms cummin out my arse ive dun that much (ouch) ...........any ideas...................................................
